text: This week brings an amazing chance to get glammed up like The Real Housewives of New York City! Carole Radziwill, Ramona Singer and Dorinda Medley have all donated items of clothing worn on the show and straight out of their closets to be sold by thredUP. ( Luann de Lesseps has also donated some special items of clothing which will be sold at a later date. ) Each Housewife gets to choose her favorite charity for the proceeds to be donated. Items have been priced to start from $ 5. 99 to $ 600 and include luxe names including Balanciaga and Diane von Furstenberg. There are some real gems, but you'll have to act fast! Here are some of the most memorable items up for grabs : Carole Radziwill
